extendedInfo.description: Have fun while learning to grow marijuana by playing  Weed Farmer a virtual cannabis plant growing game.â Purchase includes lifetime online play and access to a helpful and friendly community of over 100,000 players. Welcome Weed Farmer! Get ready to accept the challenges and reap the rewards as you increase your growing skills and bank account by farming 30 different strains of cannabis plants. Manage each stage of a plant's growth and production, from seed germination to the final harvest, you control it all.Upgrade your grow location from a small starting closet to a massive warehouse. Choose from a large number of supplies and equipment to install for creating multiple specialized growing rooms.â WEED FARMER IS MUCH MORE THAN A VIRTUAL PLANT GROWING APPâ 30 unique types of weed to grow, harvest, sell and collect.â Fully Online with dedicated servers storing each action you perform resulting in no loss of game data.â Fight off attacks by bugs and fungus while avoiding dehydration and nutrient deficiency.â Specialized grow areas allow for direct plant interaction during each stage of a plant's growing cycle. â Manage all aspects of growing such as lighting, ventilation, growing mediums, water supply, hydro pumps and many more.â Buff up your plants by adding fertilizer, regular watering and transplanting to different growing mediums.â Chat live in game with other growers to share tips and brag about your latest harvests.â Increase your growing skill to increase profits by learning to growing more difficult types of weed.â Leader boards show wealthiest growers, most skilled growers, highest yielding harvests and more.â Events like in-game holiday events and reward gearTo learn more about playing the game of Weed Farmer go to http://www.Weed-Farmer.com/guides/FOR THOSE HAVING ISSUES: Please write us at support@weed-farmer.com and we will get back to you.  We can't help you if you just leave a negative comment, as we have no way to connect comments to customers.  99% of all known problems can be resolved if we can communicate with you.ATTENTION T-Mobile Customers:  Sometime around 11/15/2011 T-Mobile added our web services domain to their WebGuard blacklist.  Please see link below to fix:http://support.t-mobile.com/docs/DOC-2144ABOUT THE DEVELOPERSGrow Brothers http://www.grow-brothers.com are the creators of Weed Farmer are dedicated to providing a high quality online gaming experience. We consider customer support a high priority with emails being answered in less than 24 hours. Additional support web sites for Weed Farmer are available including a community forum:http://wwww.weedfarmerforum.comhttp://www.weed-farmer.com provides detailed guides and tutorials for new players at http://www.weed-farmer.com/guides.htmlTerms of Servicehttp://www.weed-farmer.com/mobile/license_agreement_tos.html

reviews.title: Awesome..BUT
reviews.comment: This game is awesome. The best I\'ve ever played. So realistic..but not enough. Getting only around 10 ounces with 4 plants? In reality you get anywhere from at least 1 lb to 5lbs from a single plant on a really good grow and farmer. Plz change out it? If even pay a couple bucks for the update
reviews.author: Brad Bruner

reviews.title: Game
reviews.comment: I love the game no complaints except for the fact that it won\'t let me put gizmos on any of my farms
reviews.author: Stevie Wazal

reviews.title: Too slow
reviews.comment: Level gains are so slow it\'s pathetic. I\'ve harvested plants at the slow grow rates for almost 4 months and i\'m only level 6.5. What game has levels in tenths anyways? The concept is good but the game sucks!... also mailed grow brothers about a glitch and haven\'t heard anything back and it has yet to be fixed
reviews.author: steven myler

reviews.title: Different on my new phone
reviews.comment: Had it before loved the game and overgrown ... Got a new HTC and some things are wrong . It\'s slow and really laggy now ,the menus in the game are off sized makes it hard to play, I couldn\'t get my existing data back had to start again and overgrown doesn\'t seem to be on the market anymore ..
reviews.author: adam shannon

reviews.title: Good game but could be better, more fun.
reviews.comment: Most of the time is spent waiting for plants to grow,Plants grow too slow and Profits and yields are too low. And some items like newts aren\'t used realistically a whole $30 bag on one plant! That would be newt burn! Don\'t grow above your exp level! That will stop u from all sick plants! Overall great but could be better.:-) ADD LOLLIPOPING AND TOPPING TO INCREASE YIELDS!!
reviews.author: Bob Walker

reviews.title: Don\'t like
reviews.comment: This app blows I can\'t get it to work right and I lost all my progress for no reason not worth the Money!!!
reviews.author: stoner McGuire

reviews.title: Help
reviews.comment: They are no help  Email support for password & they will reject it
reviews.author: Carrie Walter

reviews.comment: Best game l ever paid for
reviews.author: Ray Bennett

reviews.title: Great game!
reviews.comment: Enjoyable to play not terribly hard to learn. Excellent!
reviews.author: William Mann

reviews.title: Great time killer
reviews.comment: Takes constant attention. Fun. Much faster after the update.
reviews.author: Daniel Johnson

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Great game, really does show you that it is just a plant.. :)
reviews.author: Elijah Davis

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Fuckin great game best one ever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cant use on new phone
reviews.comment: Loved this game on my old phone but when I try to use it on my new phone, it signs in ok but It wont let me use my nickname, it says its already in use, is there any way I can use it on this phone? Really dont want to start over
reviews.author: Tom Hall

reviews.title: Droid phone
reviews.comment: Its a great game but takes too long too grow the plants
reviews.author: allen smith
